message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I believe you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $10,200 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
